Html:
dose it support the offline Route ?

it seems that i cannot get the offline route unless i have searched it online and saved it to the Cache. but my NoteBook is forbidden to connect to the Internet. i have to copy the map data "Data.gmdb" to "\Local Settings\Application Data\GMap.NET\TileDBv5\en"

i cant find any Routes or PlaceMarks evenif the keyword is "Beijing" when the folder "\Application Data\GMap.NET\RouteCache\" and "\Application Data\GMap.NET\GeocoderCache" are both empty.

what can i do to search the Route offline?
is there any solution for the offline route searching?
does it support the so-called "offline map pack" or something else?

Plz help me! Thanks very much!
